original_text: The priests, the Levites, the musicians, the gatekeepers and the temple servants settled in their own towns, along with some of the other people, and the rest of the Israelites settled in their towns.
korean_text: 이에 제사장들과 레위 사람들과 백성 몇과 노래하는 자들과 문지기들과 느디님 사람들이 각자의 성읍에 살았고 이스라엘 무리도 각자의 성읍에 살았더라

sentences.original_text: The priests settled in their own towns
the Levites settled in their own towns
the musicians settled in their own towns
the gatekeepers settled in their own towns
the temple servants settled in their own towns
along with some of the other people
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 백성 중 몇몇 사람들과 함께

sentences.original_text: and the rest of the Israelites settled in their towns
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나머지 이스라엘 백성들은 자신들의 도시에 정착했다
